title: Login Screen Not Appearing
body:
http://prntscr.com/hqcqpi
I recently got this issue today and ive tried restarting my pc, re-installing and using the hextech repair tool but nothing seems to work, if you know how to fix it please let me know.

replies.body: Usually, that blank login screen can be a sign that your network just isn't able to grab the information it needs from our servers. Check out things like firewalls and antivirus to make sure your network isn't being blocked by going through the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but do also pay extra attention to the steps on port forwarding as well to make sure those ports are open for traffic in the first place.
